title: (x) "Manon" curly script for announcement card - Curlz {Mike F}
content:
Hello

I m french therefore excuse me for my english.

I would like to know the ID on this birth announcement card (see picture below)

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20081008042609im_/http:/www.typophile.com/files/police_4190.jpg)

Thank you very much.

 [‹ (x) "Changing The Possiblities Of Cash" fat face - Didoni {Adriano S}](http://web.archive.org/web/20081008042609/http:/www.typophile.com/node/38960 "Go to previous forum topic") [(x) Clouds, 11 Amazing Photoshop brushes, similar to Klavika - Stainless {Stephen, Brandon S} ›](http://web.archive.org/web/20081008042609/http:/www.typophile.com/node/38958 "Go to next forum topic")
author: fsa

comments.content:
That is [Curlz](http://web.archive.org/web/20081008042609/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/agfa/curlz-mt/familytree.html).

In case you have any Microsoft CDs lying around, Curlz was bundled with [several MS programs](http://web.archive.org/web/20081008042609/http:/www.microsoft.com/typography/fonts/font.aspx?FID=91&FNAME=Curlz+MT&FVER=1.02).
